sourcesContent:
Sign-Up


Already Have Account? Click To Login

Login


Don't Have Account? Click To SignUp
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Route, Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signin', templateUrl: './signin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signin.component.css'], }) export class SigninComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} showLogin: boolean = false; openlogin() { this.showLogin = true; } openSignup() { this.showLogin = false; } }
